Weather: NZ faces ‘extreme fire risk’ as mercury rises ahead of strong winds gusting up to 150km/h https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-nz-faces-extreme-fire-risk-as-mercury-rises-ahead-of-strong-winds-gusting-up-to-150kmh/T6SBMKDHEZB5RP76XNLN3AHOOM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-nz-faces-extreme-fire-risk-as-mercury-rises-ahead-of-strong-winds-gusting-up-to-150kmh/T6SBMKDHEZB5RP76XNLN3AHOOM/ UV levels are also extreme while strong winds predicted to gust up to 150km/h. Fri, 06 Dec 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Brad Wyatt gets insights into the Bay’s hospitality and events scene from both his work and his play.
A decade after the mystery disappearance of Fiona Wills: ‘We never found a thing’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/a-decade-after-the-mystery-disappearance-of-fiona-wills-we-never-found-a-thing/ZQM3AQI7D5BJ3FDWP7AG3FX2FM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/a-decade-after-the-mystery-disappearance-of-fiona-wills-we-never-found-a-thing/ZQM3AQI7D5BJ3FDWP7AG3FX2FM/ Doug LaingFiona Wills went to feed the chickens on December 9, 2014. She hasn't been seen since. Fri, 06 Dec 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Fiona Wills, pictured in the cafe she ran at Trelinnoe Garden Park, which she and husband John established, near Te Pohue. On December 9, 2014, suffering dementia and the recent passing of her husband, she disappeared while going to feed her chickens. She hasn't been seen since. Photo / NZME
Wellington mum discovers toddler has high risk neuroblastoma after tummy pain complaint https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-mum-discovers-toddler-has-high-risk-neuroblastoma-after-tummy-pain-complaint/Z4U74HBAOBAQTBXMODWQD5M4DA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-mum-discovers-toddler-has-high-risk-neuroblastoma-after-tummy-pain-complaint/Z4U74HBAOBAQTBXMODWQD5M4DA/ Georgina CampbellMagnus has a 38% chance of survival and will soon start chemotherapy. Fri, 06 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Diana Troebner and Mario Alcalde San Martin with their son Magnus Alcalde Troebner, who has been diagnosed with stage 4 neuroblastoma.
